mapper.insert: insert into admin(adminid , username , password , realname , contact , addtime ) values(#{adminid} , #{username} , #{password} , #{realname} , #{contact} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update admin set username=#{username} , password=#{password} , realname=#{realname} , contact=#{contact} , addtime=#{addtime} where adminid=#{adminid}
mapper.select: select a.* from admin a where 1=1 order by adminid desc
select a.* from admin a where 1=1 and adminid=#{adminid} order by adminid desc

select a.* from admin a where 1=1
and a.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{username}, '%'))
and a.password like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{password}, '%'))
and a.realname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{realname}, '%'))
and a.contact like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contact}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
